subject: Missing Parts
description_text:
Dear Ladies and Gentleman

I ordered on Nov 28 with the order number #SSN3983.
And today the package arrived which was very fast delivery! But unluckily some parts were messing. The two < Simsonn Haptic Reactor Mounting Brackets> <U-Shaped> were missing.
I attached my order aswell as my arrived parts. Please resend the missing parts to the same adress.

Thanks for your assistance !!
Best regards.
Laurin Gygax

conversations.body_text: Hi Laurin Gygax,    We will send you the new U-shaped bracket as soon as possible.

Hello
I have ordered 2 U-shaped brackets so i will need 2.
Do you have a date when you can ship them?
Thanks and best regards.
Laurin

Gesendet von Outlook für Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
